pkgmetadata.longdescription:
Environment Variables
NOTO_COLOR_EMOJI_CBDT_DEFAULT - The default CBDT family name.
Acceptable values:
"Noto Color Emoji" [default] "Noto Color Emoji (Windows)"
NOTO_COLOR_EMOJI_COLRV1_DEFAULT - The default COLRv1 family name.
Acceptable values:
"Noto COLRv1" [default] "Noto COLRv1 (noflags)"
These values can be changed through a per-package env file. Details can be found at:
https://wiki.gentoo.org/wiki//etc/portage/package.env
After setting new defaults, re-emerge the package.
